overview: Dora has been unemployed for some period of time and she and her family are therefore facing financial difficulties. One day she receives an unexpected offer to become temporary chef on a freezing trawler from Greenland. The ship will leave the port in an hour. She gives her husband and children a goodbye hug and goes on a fishing tour in the north Atlantic with a crew of 24 guys from Faroe Islands, Greenland and Iceland.
title: Dora - One of the Guys
